ComicInfo.Summary: After the Dragon uses a Martian shrinking ray on the entire Vicious Circle, and after William Johnson visits his vengeful brother Edgar in jail, Octopus reveals to Powerhouse that he has put Cyberface's head inside Brainiape's glass "skull."
